email: You must enter a valid email
phoneNumber: You must enter a valid Phone Number
uniqueUsername: This username already exists, please choose another one
uniquePhoneNumber: This phone number already exists, please choose another one
uniqueEmail: This email already exists, please choose another one

passwordContains.uppercase: Password must contain an uppercase letter
passwordContains.lowercase: Password must contain a lowercase letter
passwordContains.specialCharacter: Password must contain an special character letter

confirmPasswordContains.uppercase: Confirm Password must contain an uppercase letter
confirmPasswordContains.lowercase: Confirm Password must contain a lowercase letter
confirmPasswordContains.number: Confirm Password must contain a number
confirmPasswordContains.specialCharacter: Confirm Password must contain an special character letter

maxDate: You must be older than 13 to register
throttlerError: You have made too many requests, please wait at least a minute
usernameAcceptedChar: Username must only contain number, characters, '.', '_'
leadingTrillingDot: Username Can't start or end with a dot

files.imageType: An image can only have a 'jpeg', 'png', and 'bmp' file extension
files.videoType: A Video can only have a 'mp4', and 'mov' file extension
files.imageSize: An image size must not exceed 8MB
files.videoSize: A video size must not exceed 250MB

post.allThree: You can't add image, video, text together
post.imageAndVideo: You can't add an image and a video together
post.imageAndText: You can't add an image and a text together
post.textAndVideo: You can't add a text and a video together
post.atLeastOne: You must provide at least an image, video, or text in order to publish a post
